## Problem 1

Read the Mr. Trashwheel dataset:

```{r}
trashwheel_df = 
  read_xlsx(
    "./hw2_data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
    range = cell_cols("A:N")) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(
    sports_balls = round(sports_balls),
    sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls))
```
